Grammar:    DataElement 5.1
Namespace:  shr.test
Uses:       shr.core // This shouldn't be needed, but due to bug in importer, it is!

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

Entry:   SpecialParent
Value:   string

Entry:   SpecialChild
Parent:        SpecialParent
Property: _Value 1..1
Property: _Entry.Version 0..0
